title: Residential School Survivor Society Fundraiser
description: Proceeds of sales were donated to the Indian Residential School Survivor Society.

IRSSS provides essential services to Residential School Survivors, their families, and those dealing with Intergenerational traumas. These impacts affect every family and every community across B.C. and Canada.
Work was available to purchase June 30th - July 4th online. Work was available for pickup at 1610 Pandora Street on Wednesday July 7th and July 9th from 5-8pm.

contributingArtists.name: Gillian Haigh
works: Study for Noon and Moon and Moon
